description: A quick and easy slice to make for any celebration or picnic with friends.
name: Aero Bar Choc Slice Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 blocks aero mint (or cadbury mint bubbly)

recipeInstructions.text: Finely crush the biscuits & set aside.
Pop all other ingredients (except 1/2 a block of aero mint) into a bowl & microwave for 3 minutes, pausing every minute to stir.
Once all melted, add crushed biscuits and mix together. Pour into a slice tin (I use roughly 25cm x 15cm, just depends on what thickness you want your slice to be) and press in until evenly flat.
Let cool for 10 mins & sprinkle the last 1/2 block of aero mint choc (grated) over the top & pop in the fridge to set.
